66231.name: Existence of nationally representative learning assessment in grades 2 or 3 of primary education (GEM Report (2017/18))
66231.description: Binary variable denoting whether there is a nationally representative learning assessment in grades 2 or 3 of primary education, as per most recent survey in the period 2010-2015.   'Nationally representative learning assessment' refers to national, regional and international formative low-stake learning assessments. It is important to bear in mind that different types of assessments are not necessarily comparable.
